alluxio.yarn

Class ApplicationMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.yarn.ApplicationMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.async.AMRMClientAsync.CallbackHandler

    @NotThreadSafe
public final class ApplicationMaster
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.async.AMRMClientAsync.CallbackHandler
    Actual owner of Alluxio running on Yarn. The YARN ResourceManager will launch this ApplicationMaster on an allocated container. The ApplicationMaster communicates with the YARN cluster, and handles application execution. It performs operations asynchronously.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ApplicationMaster.AMRMClientAsyncFactory
      A factory which creates an AMRMClientAsync with a heartbeat interval and callback handler.

      Constructs an ApplicationMaster.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApplicationMaster

        public ApplicationMaster(int numWorkers,
                         String masterAddress,
                         String resourcePath)
        Convenience constructor which uses the default Alluxio configuration.
        Parameters:
        numWorkers - the number of workers to launch
        masterAddress - the address at which to start the Alluxio master
        resourcePath - an hdfs path shared by all yarn nodes which can be used to share resources

      • ApplicationMaster

        public ApplicationMaster(int numWorkers,
                         String masterAddress,
                         String resourcePath,
                         org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.YarnClient yarnClient,
                         org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.NMClient nMClient,
                         ApplicationMaster.AMRMClientAsyncFactory amrmFactory)
        Constructs an ApplicationMaster. Clients will be initialized and started during the start() method.
        Parameters:
        numWorkers - the number of workers to launch
        masterAddress - the address at which to start the Alluxio master
        resourcePath - an hdfs path shared by all yarn nodes which can be used to share resources
        yarnClient - the client to use for communicating with Yarn
        nMClient - the client to use for communicating with the node manager
        amrmFactory - a factory for creating an AMRMClientAsync

      • start

        public void start()
           throws IOException,
                  org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnException
        Starts the application master.
        Throws:
        IOException - if registering the application master fails due to an IO error
        org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnException - if registering the application master fails due to an internal Yarn error

      • requestAndLaunchContainers

        public void requestAndLaunchContainers()
                                throws Exception
        Submits requests for containers until the master and all workers are launched.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs while requesting or launching containers

        public void waitForShutdown()
                     throws InterruptedException
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if interrupted while awaiting shutdown

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Shuts down the application master, unregistering it from Yarn and stopping its clients.
